job.title: Machine learning Engineer
job.description: The Opportunity XAIbio aspires to create the future of drug discovery and development Were looking to recruit a Machine Learning Engineer who will help build our technology platform to engineer medicines Working in an interdisciplinary team of scientists and engineers you will take the lead in developing a groundbreaking machine learning environment and in designing algorithms to tackle biological complexity You have the opportunity to become an integral part of our foundational team and to influence the Companys future development Competitive salary and benefits apply Salary 40000 to 50000 pa depending on skills and experience To apply please submit your CV and cover letter The deadline for applications is Friday 9 July 2021 Minimum QualificationsbrbrBachelors Masters or PhD in a technical field or equivalent practical experiencebrbrExtensive knowledge of ML developer environments eg TensorFlow PyTorch ML methods libraries data structures data modelling and software architecturebrbrExperience in general purpose programming languages including CC and PythonbrbrExperience in developing software pipelines applications or packageslibraries Preferred QualificationsbrbrPhD in a field such as computer science computational neuroscience or physicsbrbrPostdoctoral research experience and a proven track record of publicationsbrbrExperience as an ML engineer and in deep learningbrbrExperience coding in JuliabrbrSelfdirected independent and highly motivated able to learn new concepts quickly comfortable in a fastpaced environmentbrbrBroad knowledge of scientific disciplines related to drug discovery and developmentbrbrFamiliarity with computational neurosciencebrbrA passion for AI
